project.title: to do list app

project.title: Capstone
project.description: In my capstone project, I developed a dynamic e-commerce website from the ground up, utilizing cutting-edge technologies. This project seamlessly combined Vue.js for the frontend and Node.js with MySQL for the backend, offering an intuitive user interface and robust database management. The result was a fully functional and responsive e-commerce platform that demonstrated my expertise in web development, front-end design, and database integration.

project.title: Temperature Converter
project.description: A converter app converting fahrenheit to celcius or celcius to fahrenheit

testimonials.name: Justin Scholtz
testimonials.message: Jason is a very friendly and helpful person, always willing to help you with anything you struggling with which makes him the perfect candidate to have on your team and I haven't even mentioned his skill set yet which is top notch. Over the past 6 months, I've noticed that his a quick learner and is able to over come any challenge that his faced with.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.message: I would like to introduce Jason, a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thoroughly enjoys collaborating with his peers and excels in project work. Jason has acquired an extensive range of skills and tools, including Web Development, JavaScript, ExpressJS, MySQL, Wireframe, VueJS, Bootstrap, and many more. I am honored to recommend him to you as a skilled and dedicated developer.

testimonials.name: Seth
testimonials.message: Jason is dedicated, hard working and a team player. He works well with his peers and performs well on his projects. Hehas a good understanding of web development and would be a valuable addition to any team that is lucky enough to have him.

testimonials.name: Imtiyaaz
testimonials.message: Jason is kind, hard-working person and is very interested in coding .He is very friendly and helpful when comes to giving new ideas .

testimonials.name: Rabia Haucha
testimonials.message: Jason is a go-getter ,he is really a gem whether on a personal or work level he is just a great human being overall.He is also very helpful and is quite intellectually smart .If you dont understand something he is always willing to explain and make sure you understand .He makes you feel comfortable and his really a joyous character.He really works hard and is very focused on his goals and work so don't disturb him but honestly a great guy and really he will make any company go from ZERO to HERO !

testimonials.name: Alonso Cupido
testimonials.message: Jason is a very great person he works well in a team and also works really hard , and he is always punctual. He has a good understanding of IT and web development, he would be a great asset to your team and a very reliable team member. Any team would be lucky if you were to accept him.

testimonials.name: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.message: Working alongside Jason on several IT ventures has been an absolute pleasure. His precision-oriented approach coupled with his knack for troubleshooting is highly commendable. He unequivocally embodies talent and commitment in his work ethic.

testimonials.name: Taflynne
testimonials.message: Jason Viljoen is very talented person. He is a kind person with drive and dedication.I like his work ethic and creative attitude to counter issues or problems. He is definitely an asset to any company that onboards him.
